item.title: Jagjeevan at Silver Jubilee of Millennium Batch NIT Kurukshetra
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: In earlier article, I talked about the effort to meet and reconnect with friends and family always fills you upâ€”it gives you a true Dose of Jagjeevan I recently received a powerful one at the Silver Jubilee celebration of my Millennium (2K) Batch at NIT Kurukshetra. It was deeply heartwarming to reconnect with old friends, relive shared memories, and celebrate the journey we began together more than two decades ago.
